generated.css: @import "https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Nunito+Sans:300,400,600&display=swap";:root{--danger-red:#f5222d;--success-green:#39c16c;--default-dark:#e2e2e2;--default-white:#fff;--secondary-white:#f4f4f4;--constant-white:#fff;--text-color:#000}*{box-sizing:border-box}body,html{margin:0;background-color:var(--secondary-white);font-family:Segoe UI,Tahoma,Geneva,Verdana,sans-serif;font-family:Nunito Sans,sans-serif,-apple-system,BlinkMacSystemFont,Segoe UI,Roboto,Oxygen,Ubuntu,Cantarell,Fira Sans,Droid Sans,Helvetica Neue;-webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased;-moz-osx-font-smoothing:grayscale}#root,body,html{height:100%}.theme-toggle{background-color:transparent!important;color:#000!important}.app{display:grid;grid-template-rows:minmax(75px,80px) 75% minmax(10%,auto);grid-template-areas:"header" "content" "footer";height:100%}.app__btn{padding:.5em;height:40px;min-width:40px;color:var(--default-white);font-size:1em;font-weight:bolder;border-style:none;border-radius:5px;transition:background-color .2s;cursor:pointer}.app__btn,.app__header{background-color:var(--default-white)}.app__header{grid-area:header;display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:center;width:100%;padding:.5em 1em}.app__header__h1{color:var(--text-color);text-transform:lowercase;text-align:center;height:fit-content;margin:0}.app__content{grid-area:content;justify-self:center;display:flex;flex-direction:column;align-items:center;width:50%;max-width:600px;overflow-y:scroll;padding:.5em 0}.app__content__no-idea{font-size:2em;color:#999;align-self:center;margin:auto}.app__footer{grid-area:footer;justify-self:center;display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center;padding:1em;background-color:var(--default-dark);width:100%}.app__footer__input{padding:1em;margin-right:.5em;width:50%;max-width:500px;border-radius:8px;border-style:none;font-size:1em}.app__footer__submit-btn{color:var(--constant-white);background-color:var(--success-green)}.app__footer__submit-btn:hover{color:var(--success-green);background-color:var(--constant-white)}@media only screen and (max-width:768px){.app__content{width:80%}.app__footer__input{width:75%}}
